content: Good morning, Rick and David. Good morning, Rick and David. The impact of COVID-19 pandemic, particularly on our retail and manufacturing segments, the economic, political and social conditions of each country in which we conduct or plan to conduct business, our relationships with the government entities and other customers we serve, regulatory matters, including resolution of the negotiations for the renewal of our retail license on Grand Cayman, our ability to successfully enter new markets, and various other risks as detailed in the company's periodic report filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
